name: line_sort
author: johnsonfung
description: Sort lines in your notes alphabetically, numerically, or reverse order

commands.name: sort_lines_alpha
commands.description: Sort lines alphabetically with optional reverse and skip first line

commands.name: sort_lines_number
commands.description: Sort lines by the first number found in each line

commands.name: sort_lines_number_last
commands.description: Sort lines by the last number found in each line

commands.name: dedupe_lines
commands.description: Remove duplicate lines keeping first or last occurrence

commands.name: get_dupes
commands.description: Find and display duplicate lines grouped together
